title: 3 shot, 1 dead in Greenwood; multiple people in custody
content:
Autoplay:3 shot, 1 dead in Greenwood; several people in custodyCONNECTING...
GREENWOOD, Ind. -- One person is dead after a shooting Thursday morning in Greenwood.
The shooting happened in the 500 block of N. Meridian Street around 11 a.m.
Police say three people in total were shot, and multiple people are in custody. The person who was killed was shot in the chest. Their identities have not yet been released.
Two Greenwood schools were on lockdown because of the shooting: Northeast Elementary School and Isom Elementary School. Those lockdowns were lifted after approximately 30 minutes.
The lockdown at Isom and Northeast Elementary Schools has been lifted.
— Dr. Kent DeKoninck (@Greenwoodsupt) December 15, 2016
Police were not able to provide any further details on the arrests.
